org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.mxml

Class MXMLDialect2006

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.mxml.MXMLDialect
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.mxml.MXMLDialect2006
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MXMLDialect2009

    public class MXMLDialect2006
extends MXMLDialect
    This singleton class represents the 2006 dialect of MXML, with the language namespace "http://www.adobe.com/2006/mxml".

    The special language tags of this dialect are <Binding>, <Component>, <Metadata>, <Model>, <Script>, and <Style>.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.mxml.MXMLDialect

      • collapseWhitespace

        public String collapseWhitespace(String s,
                        char replacementChar)
        Description copied from class: MXMLDialect
        Removes whitespace from the input string and returns a string that contains at most 1 'replacementChar' character between each word.

        This method can be used to strip newlines, tabs, multiple spaces, etc. between words and replace them with a single space.

        Specified by:
        collapseWhitespace in class MXMLDialect
        Parameters:
        s - The input String.
        replacementChar - The character that replaces whitespace between words.
        Returns:
        The output String.
